_header: Almighty God in Trinity / That bought man
_description: The Apocryphal History of the Infancy — in 12- and 8-line stanzas

BLAdd31042.First Lines: Allemyghty god in Trynyteeþat boughte man on þe Rode so dere…
BLAdd31042.Last Lines: …Withowten ende with ȝow to wonneThare Ioyes are euer & myrthe & playe
BLAdd31042.Attributed Title: Here Bigynnys the Romance of the childhode of Ihesu Criste þat clerkes callys Ipokrephum (rubric, f. 163va)
BLAdd31042.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             “Nachträge zu Legenden.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         74 (1885): 327-68: 327-39.

BLHar2399.First Lines:
Alle myȝty god yn trynyteÞat bowth man on rode
                    dere…
BLHar2399.Last Lines:
…for your holy myȝtus mostGrante vsyour blysse par
                        cheryte
BLHar2399.Note: Partially illegible due to manuscript damage.
BLHar2399.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             Sammlung altenglischer Legenden.
         Heilbronn: Henninger, 1878: 111-23; 101-10.

BLHar3954.First Lines: LOrd god in triniteÞu boutyst man on rode dere…
BLHar3954.Last Lines: …Cryst vs chylde þat best mayffro þe peyne of helle
BLHar3954.Note: Showing much variation; includes lines 37-92, 109-82 of 3120, embedded, beginning f. 70v.
BLHar3954.Attributed Title: Hic incipit infancia saluatoris (rubric above first line, f. 70ra); Explicit infancia saluatoris (rubric below last line, f. 74ra)
